effect: Allows the Pokémon's single-target damaging moves to hit twice on the same target, with the second strike dealing 25% of the original damage.
synergies: Multi-hit moves (e.g., Power-Up Punch, Rock Blast)
Moves with secondary effects (e.g., Iron Tail, Zen Headbutt)
notes: Exclusive to Kangaskhan (Mega form only). The second hit can break substitutes and trigger additional effects. Banned in many competitive formats due to overwhelming power.
